name: strapi-postgis-geometry-plugin
description: This plugin allows users to create location inputs and store latitude and longitude values as geometry types in a PostGIS database. It also provides functionality to filter items based on their location.

scripts.prepublish:latest: npm run clean && npm run build && node build/setup-package.js

strapi.name: strapi-postgis-geometry-plugin
strapi.description: This plugin allows users to create location and polygon inputs and store latitude and longitude values as geometry types in a PostGIS database. It also provides functionality to filter items based on their location.
